document.masterDocTitle: Five new species of Zercon C. L. Koch, 1836 (Acari: Zerconidae) from northwestern Turkey

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Five new species of Zercon C. L. Koch, 1836 (Acari: Zerconidae) from northwestern Turkey

subSubSection.paragraph:
Materials examined.
303 females
,
106 males
, 76 deutonymphs and 37 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under pine trees (
Pinus
sp.), Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), olive (
Olea europaea
) and cypress trees (
Cupressus
sp.), various localities in Eceabat district (Çanakkale province), between
January 2013
and
December 2013
;
246 females
,
98 males
, 63 deutonymphs and 23 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), stone pine (
Pinus pinea
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), kermes oak (
Quercus coccifera
), juniper trees (
Juniperus
sp.), common juniper (
Juniperus communis
) and Mediterranean cypress (
Cupressus sempervirens
), various localities in Gelibolu district (Çanakkale province), between
January 2013
and
March 2014
;
285 females
,
110 males
, 64 deutonymphs and 30 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under pine trees (
Pinus
sp.), Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), blackberry (
Rubus
sp.), Lebanon cedar (
Cedrus libani
) and poplar trees (
Populus
sp.), various localities in Centre of Tekirdağ province, between
December 2013
and
March 2014
;
128 females
,
41 males
, 17 deutonymphs and 5 protonymphs, moss samples on soil layer,
41 ° 57 ' N
,
26 ° 38 ' E
, 204 m , vicinity of Paşayiğit village, Keşan district (Tekirdağ province),
April 2014
;
19 females
,
4 males
and 2 deutonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), Hungarian oak (
Quercus frainetto
), downy oak (

) and Turkish oak (

April 2013
;

and

, soil and litter samples under sessile oak (

Cupressus
sp.), various localities in Sarıyer district (İstanbul province),

;

,

) and acacia ( Acacia sp.), various localities in Silivri district (İstanbul province), between

and

;
70 females
,
42 males

,

1 female

Quercus

41 ° 59 ' N

42 females
,

,
19 males
, 27 deutonymphs and 10 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under almond (
Prunus dulcis
), blackberry (
Rubus
sp.), dog-rose (
Rosa canina
), Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia

40 ° 3 ' N

March 2014
;
127 females
,
40 males
, 49 deutonymphs and 31 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under Hungarian oak (
Quercus frainetto
), downy oak (
Quercus pubescens
), blackberry (
Rubus
sp.) and stone pine (

), various localities in Saray district (Tekirdağ province), between
September 2013
and
March 2014

106 females
,
39 males
, 43 deutonymphs and 13 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.) and juniper trees (
Juniperus
sp.), various localities in Şarköy district (Tekirdağ province),
March 2014
.

Remarks. This species was recorded from Artvin, Aydın, Denizli, Erzurum, Giresun and İstanbul provinces before, and we report new localities of this species from Turkey in this paper. This is the second most abundant specimens of
Zercon
in the study area.
